commitResults.messageTitle: Change echo to user text list functionality
Add support for different task types
Refactor design and add exception handling for invalid inputs
commitResults.messageBody: Made TaskList an object to handle task modifications and handling of illegal arguments for modifying the TaskList with the EkudIllegalArgException, while EkudInvalidCommandException is handled from the main chatbot program itself

commitResults.messageTitle: Add delete functionality for task list
Refactor code to handle all invalid inputs in TaskList

commitResults.messageBody: Also tried using enum for commands, but not done since invalid commands are already handled with the generic EkudInvalidCommandException mesage

commitResults.messageTitle: Add functionality of saving tasks in hard disk
commitResults.messageBody:
Everytime a user quits the program, the tasks are saved and loaded up for the next session.

Exceptions with reading or writing of data is also handled to inform the user of the error.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add formatting for date and times (in deadlines and events)
commitResults.messageBody:
Program now requires users to input a valid dateTime format for parsing. A similar parsing process is used

when reading from the saved task list file.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'branch-Level-7' Adds saving of tasks functionality to the program
Merge branch 'branch-Level-8' Adds support for dateTime objects in the program
Refactor code by using more OOP

commitResults.messageBody:
Uses more OOP classes, namely Parser, Ui and
Storage to improve code maintanability

Organises various classes into distinct packages, namely exceptions,
parser, storage, tasks and ui packages.
Adds Gradle wrapper files to the project.

Adds some initial basic JUnit testing for the Parser
and TaskList classes.

Configures the App such that it can be packaged
as an executable JAR file.

commitResults.messageTitle: Tweak code to comply with coding standard
commitResults.messageBody:
Introduces linebreaks to ensure ~110 chars and strictly

< 120 chars per line. Adds spacing in between 'catch' and

'(Exception e)' too.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add find tasks by keyword functionality

commitResults.messageBody: Adds more detailed JavaDocs for non-trivial private and public methods.

Refactors the code to adhere more strictly to the project's
coding standard, namely by adding line breaks and spacing
in between 'catch' and '(Exception e)' statements.

Resolved merge conflicts in Parser.java and TaskList.java
before merging.

commitResults.messageTitle: Configure checkStyle to detect coding style violations

commitResults.messageBody:
Now uses checkStyle as taken from
https://se-education.org/guides/tutorials/checkstyle.html
to detect coding style violations in real time in
IntelliJ IDE.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JavaFX GUI files to ui package
commitResults.messageBody:
Files taken from https://se-education.org/guides/tutorials/javaFxPart4.html.

Also shifted all pre-existing classes and packages into a new ekud package,

and removed the unused Duke.java file.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor codebase to work with the JavaFX GUI
commitResults.messageBody:
Removed the old command line UI. To work with
the GUI, all outputs printed via System.out.println()
in the old version now return a String response for
every user input instead. Ekud.java has been
modified in various places too.

Replaces the old command line interface with the
JavaFX GUI.
Uses varargs for the addEvent() function in TaskList.java for a start.
Introduces the use of varargs.
Second merge for minor changes.

Currently, there are no Java assertions in place to verify
assumptions about the chatbot's state at various points.

Given that the program is getting larger, it is becoming increasingly
difficult and time-consuming to identify bugs caused by invalid
assumptions or mistakes regarding the program's state.

Adding assertions helps to address this potential issue.

For a simple start, let's add some assertions to a few key methods
of the chatbot, namely its constructor and the main function for parsing
and executing commands. Future assertions shall be added progressively
according to evolving requirements.

Codebase hasn't been refactored in a while, which may lead to unsafe
practises or readability issues, eventually leading to bugs.

Examining the code and refactoring it by adhering to code quality
guidelines helps to prevent technical debt from accumulating.

For this refactoring commit, let's
* ensure that all switch-case/if blocks have a default/else block
to handle invalid cases
* ensure guard clauses are used where applicable to prevent
unnecessary nesting and make the happy path prominent
* replace magic literals
* use enums where possible, namely the TaskType enum
* avoid complicated expressions
Add assertions and some javadocs
Improve Code Quality

Currently, the lack of priorisation of tasks makes it
hard to begin assigning tasks to clear.

Let's assign a priority level to every task, mark it
clearly for the user, and allow the user to change the
priority level.

The current GUI looks disorganised with inadequate spacing.

Let's add some padding and margin to the DialogBox element,
and also clip the images to a circle.
Branch c priority

User and Ekud dialog boxes now have their own background color
for an improveed GUI.
Add background color
Minor refactor in MainWindow.java

The parseAndExecute() method in Parser.java is currently too long,
which may impede readability.

Let's shorten the method by abstracting away details into helper
functions instead.
Shorten long method in Parser.java

Let's shift the error handling logic for index out
of bounds from taskList to parser to abide by separation
of concerns. More error handling such as end date time
being earlier than the start date time for events have
been added as well.
Add more error handling

Adds a representative screenshot (Ui.png) and a basic
user guide for all importnat features of the chatbot.
Add User Guide and Screenshot

Modifies the current GUI by having user and chatbot
dialogs, and adds a new Ui.png screenshot
Update Screenshot
